The Workspaces Menu

(keyboard shortcut: Alt-K)




Menu option

Allows you to

For more information

Manage Workspaces...
(keyboard shortcut:
Alt-K-O)

launch the Workspaces dialog which allows you to add and delete workspaces from this menu.

N.B. A workspace represent a particular collection of open view along with there positions and sizes.

See Workspaces

Workspaces list

Below 'Manage Workspaces' there will be a list of any workspaces you have added. Clicking on one of these workspace options will close all currently open Views and load the chosen workspace.

See Workspaces
